                    p.toY = absY;

item.title: EDIT:i fixed it remove please
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

ok so the first ::Alltome command didnt work at all

so i added this in: if (playerCommand.startsWith("alltome") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("tainted"))) { for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client other = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; other.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel); } }
but when i use it it just dissconnects me

this is the old ::alltome command:if (playerCommand.startsWith("alltome")) { try { for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { String name = playerCommand.substring(10); if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { Client other = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; other.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel); } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }
